name: Monster Truck Hill Dash Race
description:
Do you love to drive Monster Truck to climb hills?

If Yes, Download this monster truck now, All Level is totally Fee!

Features
1. Drive monster truck and Jump across road and hill
2. Have three mode - Easy, Medium, Difficult
3. Drive monster truck offroad and fly over the air
4. Fantastic graphic, Real Shadow and Real Feeling to drive.
5. Relax racing for time killing and discover realistic hill climb with your 4x4 Offroad

If you love, this game please send us any suggest or feedback. we love to solve that for you.
